Html:
I wrote a script to simply batch convert a directory of x12 files to XML but I receive a general fault error.

The weird thing is it works fine when I run the command on the files one at a time, but when I put them into a looping script they error out. I have tried adding a 5 second delay between each execution but the error still persists. Here is the debug information:
